metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15503 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: LibRaw before 0.20-RC1 lacks a thumbnail size range check. This affects decoders/unpack_thumb.cpp, postprocessing/mem_image.cpp, and utils/thumb_utils.cpp. For example, malloc(sizeof(libraw_processed_image_t)+T.tlength) occurs without validating T.tlength.

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
